mapper.select: select * from review where parent_seq = #{parent_seq} order by 1 desc
select * from (select review.*, row_number() over(order by 1 desc) rnum from review where id=#{id}) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from review where id=#{value}

select id, parent_seq,(select name from map where seq = parent_seq), content from (select parent_seq, content, id, row_number() over(partition by parent_seq order by rating desc,length(content) desc) rank from review where parent_seq in (#{top1},#{top2},#{top3},#{top4},#{top5})) where rank = 1 order by parent_seq desc
